titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 967) amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to permit Members to vote by proxy in certain cases, and for other purposes.
Providing for the consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 967) amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to permit Members to vote by proxy in certain cases, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mrs. Luna. Petition No: 118-17.
